price: 55. Bazali kokanisa te, misolo na bana oyo tondimeli bango?
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
